adept.common

Class DocumentEvent.Provenance

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.DocumentEvent.Provenance
  • Enclosing class:
    DocumentEvent

    public static final class DocumentEvent.Provenance
extends Object
    Represents evidence for the existence of an event. This could be 'standalone' evidence or it could come from an EventMention. This class reflects the uncertainty. This class is locally immutable.

      • getEventMention

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<EventMention> getEventMention()
        If there is a supporting EventMention, returns it. If present, the EventMention 's own provenance will be getEventText().
